errors.error_description: Incorrect order of installation steps - installing package before creating virtual environment
correction_candidates:
python -m venv ./.venv     # Creates a virtual env in the current folder
source .venv/bin/activate  # Activates the venv

python3 -m venv ./.venv
source .venv/bin/activate
python -m pip install folio_migration_tools

conda create -n folio_env python=3.9
conda activate folio_env
errors.golden_answer:
python -m venv ./.venv     # Creates a virtual env in the current folder
source .venv/bin/activate  # Activates the venv
